rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: This is a small bathroom. Peeling wallpaper surounds the yellowing lavatories. Soaps lie in the bathtub and a toothbrush protrudes from the sink drawer.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: This is a large bedroom. An unmade bed occupies one corner, while a dresser, desk and drawer occupy the other.

rooms.name: TopStair
rooms.description: This is a long hallway. Various photos of family and friends line the walls.

rooms.name: LivingRoom
rooms.description: This is a living room. a tv is mounted beside a book shelf and a couch lies in fron of it.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: This is a small kitchen. There are cuboards and a stove in front of you with a microwave, fridge and sink adjacent to it.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: This is a garage. Your car is parked by the door and shelves messy with miscellaneous items line the three other sides.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: This is a kitchen. A microwave lies atop the counter and under the cuboards. A table and chair sits adjacent to the fridge.
